name: Hero Lab
notes: * Tested starting the application, downloading the "Pathfinder" game mode and running it
content:
files:
- client:
    filename: hl88h_win_install.exe
    url: http://www.wolflair.com/download/hp/hl88h_win_install.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Hero Lab/HeroLab.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Hero Lab
    executable: client
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
